abstract: Petra Kvitova and Tomas Berdych of the Czech Republic swept through Marion Bartoli and Richard Gasquet of France, taking both singles matches to win the Hopman Cup final.
lead_paragraph: PERTH, Australia -- Petra Kvitova and Tomas Berdych of the Czech Republic swept through Marion Bartoli and Richard Gasquet of France, taking both singles matches to win the Hopman Cup final on Saturday.

headline.main: Czechs' Singles-First Strategy Pays Off at Hopman Cup
